certifications.title: Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification

projects.name: BankEase
projects.description: Full Stack Banking Application. Integrated multiple bank accounts using Plaid, displaying balances and account details. Implemented ultra-secure SSR authentication with Next.js and Appwrite. Built a Next.js dashboard with Chart.js for real-time updates, transactions, and spending, added paginated transaction history with TypeScript, used React Hook Form and Zod for validation and Tailwind CSS for frontend.

projects.name: Geargrid
projects.description: Full Stack Ecommerce application. Developed an e-commerce app with Payload CMS, Tailwind CSS and Next.js, boosting user engagement. Built an admin panel with real-time analytics, inventory management, and order tracking to streamline operations.

projects.name: Threads
projects.description: Full Stack Social Media Application. Developed a web app for global interaction, utilizing Next.js, NodeJS, and MongoDB. Implemented real-time chat and notifications, Integrated user authentication and authorization using Clerk.

projects.name: Authentication
projects.description: Backend Application. Implemented user authentication with email verification using Mailtrap to ensure secure account registration. Developed functionality for resetting passwords, allowing users to update their credentials securely. Integrated a 'forgot password' feature, enabling users to recover their accounts via email.

projects.name: Mi Store
projects.description: Frontend Application. Built a fully responsive Mi Store website using React.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React Bootstrap. Optimized component rendering and reduced load times for improved performance and faster user interactions.

experiences.description: Designed and implemented websites and themes, enhancing SEO strategies, which led to a significant boost in website traffic and online visibility.
Led a team of 20 to conduct technical workshops, enhancing student engage. Organized workshops on War of Drones, AI/ML, and IoT, contributing to the skill development of over 200 students.
